Summary: original photo of event reported earlier
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Sedona
There was one other sighting in Sedona on or around August 5th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile on vacation in Sedona AZ..Had my Sony Cybershot on auto focus and auto flash.While starring at the small screen on camera..i noticed a flash at about the same time my camera flashed(if it did)..like a secondary flash or something.Didnt give it more than 2 seconds thought until days later when I was showing pics on 61" HDTV screen. Ive shown it to a couple of peole in tho photo industry and have been told "solar flare" and "never seen aything like it"..If anyone has an idea id like to hear it. email me at: kdeem2323@cox.net Karim
